messages.message:
A light earthquake with magnitude 4.2 (ml/mb) was detected on Wednesday, 94 km E of Loreto, Mexico (58 miles).
A tsunami warning has not been issued (Does not indicate if a tsunami actually did or will exist).
Exact location of earthquake, longitude -110.4023 West, latitude 26.0235 North, depth = 14.095 km.
In the past 24 hours, there have been nineteen, in the last 10 days nineteen, in the past 30 days nineteen and in the last 365 days nineteen earthquakes of magnitude 3.0 or greater that have been detected nearby.
Read more about the earthquake, Seismometer information, Distances, Parameters, Date-Time, Location and details about this quake, detected near: 94 km E of Loreto, Mexico.

A light earthquake magnitude 4.2 (ml/mb) has occurred on Thursday, 125 km ENE of Luganville, Vanuatu (78 miles).
The epicenter of the earthquake was roughly 10 km (6 miles) below the earth’s surface.
A tsunami warning has not been issued (Does not indicate if a tsunami actually did or will exist).
In the past 24 hours, there have been eighteen, in the last 10 days nineteen, in the past 30 days nineteen and in the last 365 days nineteen earthquakes of magnitude 3.0 or greater that have been detected nearby.
Read more about the earthquake, Seismometer information, Distances, Parameters, Date-Time, Location and details about this quake, that has occurred near: 125 km ENE of Luganville, Vanuatu.

A 4.4 magnitude earthquake struck Italy’s Campi Flegrei super volcano Monday evening, causing mild damage in the town of Pozzuoli, the epicenter, and as far away as the city of Naples, some 20 kilometers (12 miles) away, according to Italy’s National Institute of Geophysics and Volcanology (INGV).
The 4.4 earthquake at a depth of 3 kilometers is the strongest earthquake to hit the highly seismic area in the past 40 years, according to INGV data.
The quake is part of an ongoing “seismic storm” that has seen more than a dozen events over 2.0 magnitude in the past 48 hours.
The INGV recorded 1,252 earthquakes in the Campi Flegrei area in the month of April 2024, most with a magnitude less than 1.0.
More than 500,000 people live in the red zone directly adjacent to the Campi Flegrei, according to the Italian Civil Protection agency, which has been working this year to update evacuation plans in the event of a major disaster.

Cracks in walls and falling cornices were reported, Italy’s Fire Brigade spokesman confirmed to CNN.

WICHITA, Kan. — Fast-moving storms with strong winds, large hail and apparent tornadoes swept Oklahoma and Kansas, blowing roofs off homes and blocking roads with toppled trees and downed power lines.
In central Kansas, a 100 mph wind gust was reported at the airport in Salina, the National Weather Service said.
The weather service said it received 13 tornado reports Sunday from Oklahoma, Kansas and Colorado.
Parts of Nebraska, Iowa and Minnesota could also see some flooding with heavy rain swelling rivers and creeks, the weather service said.
Thursday’s storms left at least seven dead and brought much of Houston to a standstill.

Fast-moving storms with strong winds, large hail and apparent tornadoes swept Oklahoma and Kansas, blowing roofs off homes and blocking roads with toppled trees and downed power lines.
In central Kansas, a 100 mph wind gust was reported at the airport in Salina, the National Weather Service said.
The weather service said it received 13 tornado reports Sunday from Oklahoma, Kansas and Colorado.
The National Weather Service warned of an enhanced risk of severe storms late Monday night into early Tuesday in parts of Colorado, Kansas and Nebraska.
Parts of Nebraska, Iowa and Minnesota could also see some flooding with heavy rain swelling rivers and creeks, the weather service said.
